__e: I am looking at life in prison for what I've done, with or without special considerations.
I say being in prison her whole life long... best thing that ever happened to that girl.
But the thought of you sitting in a prison cell for the rest of your life gives me great afterlife pleasure.

Unless the pre-sentence report indicates that he is, in fact... the Messiah come again... he will very likely be sentenced to life, no parole... by a Baltimore judge who, for once in his life... gets to leave his office feeling that his job actually matters.
And then we'll get 30 years to life, in that wonderful, beautiful country club of a jail.
And I am stuck in here for life without the possibility of parole, so what the hell do you think you could give me that would be worth a damn?
